means: （飞机上的）女服务员，空中小姐

sentence.Network_en: Please show your ticket to the stewardess when you board the plane.
sentence.Network_cn: 登机时请向空中小姐出示机票.

sentence.Network_en: Only the stewardess can go from the cabin to the cockpit.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有空中小姐才能从乘客座舱进入驾驶员座舱.

sentence.Network_en: The stewardess hurried the passengers onto the plane.
sentence.Network_cn: 空中小姐催乘客赶快登机.

entry.tran: (船舶、飞机或火车上的)女服务员，女乘务员
entry.def: A stewardess is a woman who works on a ship, plane, or train, looking after passengers and serving meals to them.

means.word_mean: 1. a woman steward on an airplane

auth_sentence.content: The boat was crewed by the skipper...and the stewardess.

sentences.en: The stewardess hurried the passengers onto the plane.
sentences.cn: 空中小姐催乘客赶快登机。

sentences.en: Please show your ticket to the stewardess when you board the plane.
sentences.cn: 登机时请向空中小姐出示机票。

sentences.en: Only the stewardess can go from the cabin to the cockpit.
sentences.cn: 只有空中小姐才能从乘客座舱进入驾驶员座舱。

sentences.en: If you need help, stewardesses will be pleased to help you.
sentences.cn: 如果你需要帮忙的话, 空中小姐会很高兴为你效劳。
